summary:
The tale of revenge will see Atsu "avenge her family, armed with the same katana used to pin her to that burning tree all those years ago. The trailer is called The Onryo's List, and it serves as the story setup for the game:

"Sixteen years ago in the heart of Ezo (called Hokkaido in present day), a gang of outlaws known as the Yōtei Six took everything from Atsu. Pre-orders for the game go live on 2nd May, and there'll be a Digital Deluxe Edition and a physical Collector's Edition to choose from.
